application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Rear garden: T1 - Cherry tree (10m) - reduce crown by up to 2m to previous pruning points.T2 - lime tree (9m) - reduce height by approximately 2m, retaining furnishing growth, and thin crown by approximately 20% keeping low screen.T3 - lime tree - (10m) - reduce height by approximately 2m, retaining furnishing growth, and thin crown by approximately 20% keeping low screen.T4 - lime tree (9m) - reduce height by approximately 2m, retaining furnishing growth, and thin crown by approximately 20% keeping low screen.T6 - oak tree (9m) - remove epicormic shoots from main stem and deadwood.T7 - lime tree (7m) - reduce height by up to 2m, retaining furnishing growth.T8 - lime tree (8m) - reduce branches overhanging garden by up to 2m and reduce height to previous pruning points, retaining furnishing growth, approximately 1m.T9 - lime tree (8m) - reduce branches overhanging garden by up to 2m and reduce height to previous pruning points, retaining furnishing growth, approximately 1m reduction. T10 - lime tree (8m) - reduce branches overhanging garden by up to 2m and reduce height to previous pruning points, retaining furnishing growth, approximately 1m reduction. T11- lime tree (8m) - reduce branches overhanging garden by up to 2m and reduce height to previous pruning points, retaining furnishing growth, approximately 1m reduction. Front garden -T12 - lime tree (10m) - reduce height by approximately 2m, retaining furnishing growth, and thin crown by approximately 20% keeping low screen.
